Class InputOutOfRangeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • edu.montgomerycollege.cmsc204.jbryant.InputOutOfRangeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InputOutOfRangeException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Input Out-of-Range Exception An exception that can occur when a user enters an out-of-range (not 1-9) value for a cell
    Author:
    Jamison Bryant (jbryan46@montgomerycollege.edu) for CMSC 204 (R. Alexander) M/W 1PM-3PM
    See Also:
